channel.title: Saddle Documentation on nspl
channel.description: Recent content in Saddle Documentation on nspl

item.title: Getting started
item.description: Add any of these lines to your build.sbt: // On JVM libraryDependencies += "io.github.pityka" %% "nspl-awt" % "0.1.0+5-2e724034-SNAPSHOT" // In browser, using the canvas renderer libraryDependencies += "io.github.pityka" %%% "nspl-canvas-js" % "0.1.0+5-2e724034-SNAPSHOT" // Dependencies nspl-awt depends on vectorgraphics2d nspl-canvas-js has no external dependencies besides the scalajs-dom from the Scala Js project. Example: import scala.io.Source
